title: Wizard

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose two players. All their visitors gain Daze and are informed of their current number of stacks.
- After a kill-capable player is hanged, you can immediately give two players a stack of Daze the following night as a multitask.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of each night, you learn how Dazed each player is.
- Players with Daze have -1 defense stage for each stack of Daze.
- Players with 3 stacks of Daze are Stargazing. Their fascination with the celestial bodies prevents them from receiving night feedback.
- When you die, a Meteor Shower occurs and all players are informed. All players who are Stargazing are no longer able to act at night for the rest of the game.
Destiny: Have at least three players be awed by the Meteor Shower.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: See every living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.

desc:
Post 4640
*The lover wrapped his arm around the shoulder of his equal as they laid in the midnight grass. The sky was empty of the same starlight he saw in the man's eyes, so the lover picked up a branch and gestured to the sky, conjuring stars wherever he pointed his stick to. He looked into the eyes of his partner with hope, but his lover's eyes were as shiny and distant as the stars.*
